attributes.action: explain why Lord Hutton has ordered records of Dr Kelly's death to remain secret
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A highly unusual ruling by Lord Hutton, who chaired the inquiry into Dr Kelly's death, means medical records including the post-mortem report will remain classified until after all those with a direct interest in the case are dead, 

And a 30-year secrecy order has been placed on written records provided to Lord Hutton's inquiry which were not produced in evidence.

Why?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
